00245 void socket_setoptions(int socketFd )
00246 {
00247   unsigned int SbMax = (1<<30) ;  /* 1GB*/
00248   int one = 1;
00249 
00250 
00251   while (SbMax > 1048576 )
00252     {
00253       if ((setsockopt(socketFd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (char *)&SbMax, sizeof( SbMax ) ) < 0 ) ||
00254           (setsockopt(socketFd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (char *)&SbMax, sizeof( SbMax ) ) < 0 ) )
00255         {
00256           SbMax >>= 1; /* SbMax = SbMax/2 */
00257           continue;
00258         }
00259 
00260       break;
00261     }
00262 
00263   return;
00264 } /* socket_setoptions_ctrl */
